      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void call(java.lang.String url)
      Calls a route URL with the parameters embedded; example "/user/ryanw-se/project/1".

      Calls a route URL with the parameters embedded; example "/user/ryanw-se/project/1".
      void callExt(java.lang.String url)
      Calls an external URL without parameters, typically used for simple things like "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8To-6VIJZRE".
      void callExt(java.lang.String url, Bundle parameters)
      Calls an external URL with parameters, typically used for passing additional information, along with a simple external URL.

      Gets the Context to be used when using Intents to launch new Activitys.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Route> getPredefinedRoutes()

      static SimpleRouter getSharedRouter()
      Gets a global statically defined router, accessible from everywhere within the project.

      Routes a URL to a Android Activity to be opened when the URL is called.

      Routes a URL to a callback function code block and to a Android Activity to be opened when the URL is called.

      Routes a URL to a callback function code block, with code to be executed when the URL is called.

      Sets the Context to be used when using Intents to launch new Activitys.

                  RouteCallback<Route> routeCallback)
        Routes a URL to a callback function code block, with code to be executed when the URL is called.
        Parameters:

        routeCallback - The code block to execute when the URL is called.

      • route

        public void route(java.lang.String routeUrl,
                  java.lang.Class<? extends Activity> targetClass)
        Routes a URL to a Android Activity to be opened when the URL is called.
        Parameters:
        routeUrl - The URL to route to the Android Activity.
        targetClass - The Android Activity to open when the URL is called.

      • route

        public void route(java.lang.String routeUrl,
                  java.lang.Class<? extends Activity> targetClass,
                  RouteCallback<Route> routeCallback)
        Routes a URL to a callback function code block and to a Android Activity to be opened when the URL is called.
        Parameters:
        routeUrl - The URL to route to the callback function code block and Android Activity.
        targetClass - The Android Activity to open when the URL is called.
        routeCallback - THe code block to execute when the URL is called.

      • call

        public void call(java.lang.String url)
        Calls a route URL with the parameters embedded; example "/user/ryanw-se/project/1".
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to call and identify with the router.

      • call

        public void call(java.lang.String url,
                 Bundle extras)
        Calls a route URL with the parameters embedded; example "/user/ryanw-se/project/1".
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to call and identify with the router.
        extras - Additional parameters to pass along with the URL parameters.

      • callExt

        public void callExt(java.lang.String url)
        Calls an external URL without parameters, typically used for simple things like "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8To-6VIJZRE".
        Parameters:
        url - The external URL to launch in a new activity.

      • callExt

        public void callExt(java.lang.String url,
                    Bundle parameters)
        Calls an external URL with parameters, typically used for passing additional information, along with a simple external URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The external URL to launch in a new Activity.
        parameters - The extra parameters to pass along in the new Activity.

      • getPredefinedRoutes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Route> getPredefinedRoutes()
        Gets a list of all predefined routes, using the route(java.lang.String, me.ryanw.simplerouter.util.RouteCallback<me.ryanw.simplerouter.object.Route>) methods.
        Returns:
        List of predefined Routes without parameters.
